name: Flugskóli Íslands
about: Flugskóli Íslands, or Icelandic Aviation Training, is an Approved Training Organization (ATO) certified by the Icelandic Transportation Authority. Established in 2021 by highly experienced captains and training personnel with over 30 years of experience, the school provides comprehensive training for individuals and support to airlines. Our programs include the Integrated ATPL course, which takes only 24 months to complete, and the APS MCC course, flown on a B737-8MAX or B757-200. We are committed to safety, quality, and empowering our students to become proficient pilots. Located in Reykjavik, Iceland, we offer a professional and supportive environment for all our clients. Start your pilot journey with us and transform your passion into a profession.
services:
["PROFESSIONAL PILOT COURSE
